FuncDef:
The write-default permit command enables users to perform configuration operations.
The undo write-default permit command disables users from performing configuration operations. The write-default permit command enables users to perform configuration operations. The undo write-default permit command disables users from performing configuration operations. By default, users' permission to perform configuration operations is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
To enable users to perform configuration operations, run the write-default permit command.
Currently, the supported configuration operation is edit-config.
